channel.title: Developers Need!
channel.description:
Hello, I'm currently developing a 317 server and I'm in need of some help. I need people who are well rounded(programming,moderating players,graphics) you'll be given administrative privileges to the server and site. I will be hosting the server off a poweredge 2650 once we get more players. I'm hoping to have a release within the next week or 2.
Pm me if your interested!
Thank you!
*We're also looking for quality video editors!

item.title: Developers Need!
item.dc:creator: @Server_programer Server programer
item.description:
@Server_programer wrote:

Add more info add progress

Read full topic

item.title: Developers Need!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:13, topic:477877”]First of all, I ask that the User “zeropointx” read this response very carefully, and not be upset by this. This is not an attempt to flame or demean you in any way. You seem to be under the impression that you’re a very gifted programmer who has an extensive background and résumé. I’m going to show you that this is not the case, based upon your activity in this community. I won’t brag about myself in this Thread, but as I say later on in this response, please, feel free to send me a Private Message.

The Application was written for serious Developers/Designers who know what they’re doing. Have you ever applied for a job? When I say job, I mean a job that can lead to a career, and not a McJob. Developers and Designers are usually compensated, and the people paying for their services usually like to know beforehand that said services will be up to their standards.

Reminds me of applying to blizzard for work or something else XD. Come on this is rsps after all. And anyways good luck finding developers!

Secondly, I believe I may have offended you when I responded to this. Believe me when I tell you, it was not my intention to do so, and I always have the best of intentions when I post and contribute to this community.

It seems that you are global troll

Your knowledge of R.S.P.S. is outstanding!

Although [size=4pt]I can be a bit of a Troll sometimes.[/size]

you ansver to all topics even thought you don’t have any idea to most of them.

If this was indeed the case, I would have been ran out of this community a year ago. I’ve done MUCH more for this community than you have, that’s made obvious by your Posts and Threads (which I will get to momentarily, because I’d like to link you to your ‘silly goose’ antics).

You’ve been here since 2010 and have 51 Posts. You have my personal thanks for contributing so much to this wonderful community. Go ahead and say you have multiple accounts in defense to this, because that’s a violation of the Rules. Even though the enforcement is lax.

[quote author=zeropointx]
For example how is it really needed how many years of coding and what languages and what projects you have done and so on?[/quote]

Did you really just ask me that? You must be the troll in this situation, or you really are clueless.

Excuse me sir, your ignorance is showing.

Please refer to what I said earlier in regards as to “services”.

I love it so much when I get called out. Send me a Private Message, please. Also, do try to use proper grammar… absent of abbreviations and broken English if you don’t mind. I’m guessing English isn’t your native language, and that’s totally O.K. Latin is actually my native tongue. :D[/quote]

I’m pretty sure it’s safe to say this…

/argument

Read full topic

You’ve been here since 2010 and have 51 Posts. You have my personal thanks for contributing so much to this wonderful community. Go ahead and say you have multiple accounts in defense to this, because that’s a violation of the Rules. Even though the enforcement is lax.

Did you really just ask me that? You must be the troll in this situation, or you really are clueless.

Please refer to what I said earlier in regards as to “services”.

I love it so much when I get called out. Send me a Private Message, please. Also, do try to use proper grammar… absent of abbreviations and broken English if you don’t mind. I’m guessing English isn’t your native language, and that’s totally O.K. Latin is actually my native tongue.

item.title: Developers Need!
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:11, topic:477877”][quote author=zeropointx link=topic=596075.msg4201097#msg4201097 date=1358206815]

I never said that programming talent requires education. I don’t think you read what I said.

If so, your template is not required.
[/quote]

Requiring and wanting are two different things.[/quote]
It seems that you are global troll, you ansver to all topics even thought you don’t have any idea to most of them. For example how is it really needed how many years of coding and what languages and what projects you have done and so on? If person is skilled I would take him in, even if he has been in 1 project or only private projects. And since this person did NOT use such a stupid template he is smart. Btw good luck with finding ppl, how skilled you want them to be?

Read full topic

item.title: Developers Need!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“zeropointx, post:8, topic:477877”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=596075.msg4197430#msg4197430 date=1357709645]

Reminds me of applying to blizzard for work or something else XD. Come on this is rsps after all. And anyways good luck finding developers!

People only have this attitude for R.S.P.S. because It’s been that way for so long. Unprofessional and badly kept.

LOLCOMONUGUISEDISISONLY4RSPSNOTABIGDEALURNTWORKIN4DABLIZZARD

This is what this community does not need.

P.S. This is not like the Blizzard/Battle.net Application. Theirs is much longer and more extensive in regards as to education. They also like to have personal 1-on-1 chats.
[/quote]
I don’t think you read what I said…

“Reminds me” doesn’t mean that its same as. And if you want to have professional rsps coder I don’t think you will find one even with that template. It requires skill and only skill. You don’t have to be educated well in order to code well.[/quote]

I never said that programming talent requires education. I don’t think you read what I said.

Read full topic

item.title: Developers Need!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“T h 3, post:5, topic:477877”][quote author=zeropointx link=topic=596075.msg4196990#msg4196990 date=1357640367]

You’ll probably want to include a decent Application for potential prospects to fill out. Here’s an example:

Current Age:

Design Perspicacity:

Development Experiences:

Experience in Video Game Design:

Experience in Video Game Development:

Programming Experience in Years:

How many years have you been working with the Java Language:

Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers:

How many R.S.P.S. have you personally founded:

Public Releases and Information:

Do you have experience in Website Design and Development:

Please list any and all Languages which you are knowledgeable of:

Do you have a Certified Diploma or Degree in regards as to Programming:

Level of Education (School/College):

Personal Recommendations (people who will vouch for claims):

How many Hours per Day can you be active and ready to work:

How many Hours per Week will you be on:

Are you currently an employee anywhere:

How dependable are you:

Can you be trusted if given access to a Dedicated, or trusted with vital information:

Reminds me of applying to blizzard for work or something else XD. Come on this is rsps after all. And anyways good luck finding developers!
[/quote]

This is only the beginning of what this thread is missing[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Developers Need!
item.dc:creator: @GTR1 -GTR-
item.description:
@GTR1 wrote:

Hello, I’m currently developing a 317 server and I’m in need of some help. I need people who are well rounded(programming,moderating players,graphics) you’ll be given administrative privileges to the server and site. I will be hosting the server off a poweredge 2650 once we get more players. I’m hoping to have a release within the next week or 2.

Pm me if your interested!

Thank you!

*We’re also looking for quality video editors!
